description: This Python source file defines API routes related to feedback management, including creating and listing feedback for specific food items. It uses FastAPI's router and dependency injection features.

methods.name: FeedbackService get_service(repo: InMemoryRepository = Depends(lambda: InMemoryRepository()))
methods.description: Provides a FeedbackService instance with an in-memory repository dependency.

methods.name: create_feedback( payload: FeedbackCreate, service: FeedbackService = Depends(get_service), user: AuthUser = Depends(get_required_user), )
methods.description: API endpoint to create new feedback for a food item; requires authentication.

methods.name: list_item_feedback( item_id: str, service: FeedbackService = Depends(get_service), _: AuthUser = Depends(get_required_user), )
methods.description: API endpoint to list all feedback for a specific food item; requires authentication.

ctags.name: create_feedback
ctags.signature: ( payload: FeedbackCreate, service: FeedbackService = Depends(get_service), user: AuthUser = Depends(get_required_user), )

ctags.name: list_item_feedback
ctags.signature: ( item_id: str, service: FeedbackService = Depends(get_service), _: AuthUser = Depends(get_required_user), )
